entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gananoque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:32 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grenadier Island 1:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
